Articles.Content:
Inspired by this post:

Challenge Accepted

http://youtu.be/DSRba4VnqeI

Spent quite a while flying the Herakles during testing so having a good handle on it\'s handling qualities made it possible to achieve the SPH landing on the first try.

And the fact I finally fixed my X360 pad controls.

Used the following mods;

Damned Aeropace (Engines)

Damned Robotics (Rotatron)

C7\'s Old Flight Pack (Wings)

Tiberion\'s Shuttle Pack (Struts)

NovaPunch (SRBs, Nosecones & Engine Mounts)

Your challenge is to land on the SPH.

Rules: No helicoptors!

Leaderboard:

Have fun!

NEW CHALLENGE: this one\'s just for fun. try to crash into the mun as fast as possible, got that?

Leaderboard:
Ha, I was hoping for a spectacular explosion, not dissimilar from the actual Operation Credible Sport.
Explosions, meh its fun, but actually landing it? EPIC.
